system.requirement: Once you visit the distant past...

abilities.description: A small floating probe follows and studies you intently. Whenever you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.367804b98f30d5f4]{Explore a Waypoint} and score a strong hit, the probe beams positive chemicals into your brain allowing you to recover +1 spirit or take +1 momentum.

The probe periodically tests your intelligence by showing you a variety of geometric shapes and mathematical equations. When you participate, you may @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.c2c2f31f564caa06]{Hearten} (+wits) and take +1 momentum on a hit.

In combat, when the probe temporarily leaves to study your enemies, you may take advantage of this distraction to take control. If you do, make the @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.d34cdf2408cd22b6]{Companion Takes a Hit} move.
